title: Contemporary Chinese Woodblock Prints: Cutting Edges in Black and White
short_description: Today’s most dynamic Chinese printmakers are using their nation’s time-honored graphic medium to create truly contemporary art. These artists have inherited an impressive cultural legacy: China is renowned for the invention of paper as well as for the earliest developments of printing and woodcut illustration. The works displayed here combine traditional and innovative techniques of woodblock cutting and printing and bring fresh vision to both enduring and current themes.

input: Contemporary Chinese Woodblock Prints: Cutting Edges in Black and White
